scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-static-files && npm run build-background && npm run build-content && npm run build-options
scripts.copy-static-files: mkdir -pv dist/content && cp -rv src/content/*.html src/content/*.css src/content/*.js dist/content/ && mkdir -pv dist/options && cp -rv src/options/*.html src/options/*.css dist/options/
